link_desc: This Github repository provides capabilities for monitoring Docker containers through LLD (low level discovery) and by querying via the 'docker' command line interface. The associated zabbix-agent instances are required to set AllowRoot=1. This module uses Python scripts on the client-side to process the data. The README.md file in the repository provides installation instructions. No modification to the zabbix-agent binary is required for this "module".
author: Richard Sedlak
